tasks.label: Maven Clean Install
tasks.command: VERSION=1.1.0 && SERVER_DIR="/home/egehan/Test Server" && mvn clean install && for MODULE in bukkit bungeecord velocity; do JAR_PATH="minebridge-${MODULE}/target/MineBridge-$(echo ${MODULE} | sed 's/^\(.*\)$/\u\1/')-${VERSION}.jar"; if [ -f "$JAR_PATH" ]; then case "$MODULE" in bukkit) TARGET="${SERVER_DIR}/1.8/plugins/";; bungeecord) TARGET="${SERVER_DIR}/BungeeCord/plugins/";; velocity) TARGET="${SERVER_DIR}/Velocity/plugins/";; esac; cp "$JAR_PATH" "$TARGET"; fi; done
